ğŸ’¡ Features
âœ“ Export comments from TikTok video.

âœ“ Extract comments and replies, including: comment_id, reply_to_which_comment, user_id, username, nick_name, comment, comment_time, like_count, author_liked, reply_count, pinned_to_top, user_homepage.

âš™ï¸ Get Started
1. Enter the TikTok video link.

ğŸ”’ Data Privacy
Your data privacy is paramount. All data processing occurs locally on your machine, ensuring it never transits through our servers. This guarantees that no one else has access to your collected data.
